level.heading: LIVING ROOMS, ADMINISTRATIVE AND COUNSELING SPACE (ยง 29-6242)

level.text: The facility shall provide a common living room or day area for the use of all residents, which is equipped with comfortable furnishings, for general relaxation and entertainment which is appropriate to the resident’s age and level of development.
Each resident a work area with appropriate lighting that is quiet and conducive to studying;
Administrative office space separate from the residents’ living areas, unless specifically waived by the licensing agency; and

A designated space to allow private discussions and counseling sessions between individual residents and staff, or between individual residents and their parents, counselors, social workers, guardians ad litem or other advocates.
